fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 91.85 points or 0.49% to settle at 18,634.55. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 1.61% to 11.26. Kotak Mahindra Bank, HDFC Bank and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
